sn35.69:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma ca sariputto ayasma ca upaseno rajagahe viharanti sitavane sappasondikapabbhare.
sn35.69:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena ayasmato upasenassa kaye asiviso patito hoti.
sn35.69:1.3: Atha kho ayasma upaseno bhikkhu amantesi:
sn35.69:1.4: “etha me, avuso, imam kayam mancakam aropetva bahiddha niharatha.
sn35.69:2.1: Evam vutte, ayasma sariputto ayasmantam upasenam etadavoca:
sn35.69:2.2: “na kho pana mayam passama ayasmato upasenassa kayassa va annathattam indriyanam va viparinamam.
sn35.69:2.4: ‘etha me, avuso, imam kayam mancakam aropetva bahiddha niharatha.
sn35.69:2.9: aham jivhati va mama jivhati va …
sn35.69:2.10: aham manoti va mama mano’ti va.
sn35.69:2.11: Tassa, avuso sariputta, siya kayassa va annathattam indriyanam va viparinamo.
sn35.69:2.12: Mayhanca kho, avuso sariputta, na evam hoti:
sn35.69:2.14: aham jivhati va mama jivhati va …pe…
sn35.69:2.15: aham manoti va mama manoti va’.
sn35.69:2.16: Tassa mayhanca kho, avuso sariputta, kim kayassa va annathattam bhavissati, indriyanam va viparinamo”ti.
sn35.69:3.1: Tatha hi panayasmato upasenassa digharattam ahankaramamankaramananusayo susamuhato.
sn35.69:3.2: Tasma ayasmato upasenassa na evam hoti:
sn35.69:3.4: aham jivhati va mama jivhati va …pe…
sn35.69:3.5: aham manoti va mama mano’ti va”ti.
sn35.69:3.6: Atha kho te bhikkhu ayasmato upasenassa kayam mancakam aropetva bahiddha niharimsu.
sn35.69:3.7: Atha kho ayasmato upasenassa kayo tattheva vikiri;
